15522.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>With this, I can perform the purification ritual.
I wonder how long it's been since we've had a formal
ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15522.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「これがあれば　清めの儀式ができる。
　正式な儀式など　もう何年ぶりになるだろうな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15522.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이제 재계 의식을 치를 수 있겠군.
　정식으로 의식을 치르는 게 몇 년 만인지…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15522.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>只要有了这个，就可以举行净化仪式。
已经好多年没正式举行仪式了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15522.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>只要有了這個，就可以舉行淨化儀式。
已經好多年沒正式舉行儀式了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15523.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Alright, I'll go to the Village Arena immediately.
<pc>, it'd be good if you come by later too.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15523.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「では　わしは　さっそく
　村の武闘場へ　行くとしよう。
　<pc>も　後で　見にくるといい。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15523.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 바로 마을 무투장으로 가마.
　<pc>, 너도 나중에 구경하러 오거라.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15523.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那么，我先去村子里的比武场。
<pc>一会儿可以过来看。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15523.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>那麼，
我先去村子裡的武鬥場。
<pc>一會兒可以過來看。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15524.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>If you miss this, then who knows when the next
chance you'll get is. GAHAHA!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15524.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「これを逃すと　次にやるのが　いつになるか
　わからんからな。ガハハ！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15524.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이번 기회를 놓치면
　다음엔 언제 볼 수 있을지 모르니까, 으하하!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15524.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>错过了这次的话，
要等下次可就遥遥无期了。啊哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15524.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>錯過了這次，
要等下次可就遙遙無期了。啊哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15525.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>O' God of War who watches over us here...
May today's victor meet even stronger warriors.
May the defeated have the bravery to fight again.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15525.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「この場所で　我らを見守る　戦いの神よ……。
　今日の勝者に　さらなる強者との出会いを。
　敗者には　ふたたび戦いに向かう勇気を。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15525.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 저희를 지켜봐 주시는 싸움의 신이시여…….
　오늘의 승자에게는 새로운 강자와의 만남을.
　패자에게는 다시 싸울 용기를.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15525.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>在此守护我们的战神啊……
请让今天的胜者遇到更强的对手吧。
请赐予败者再次挑战的勇气吧。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15525.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>在此守護我們的戰神啊……
請讓今天的勝者遇到更強的對手。
賜予敗者再次挑戰的勇氣。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15526.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And may they both be unafraid of death, and be
bestowed a generous eulogy for having fought gallantly
to the end...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15526.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そして　その両者に
　死を恐れず　勇ましく　戦い抜いたことへの
　惜しみなき　賛辞を与えたまえ……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15526.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그리고 죽음의 공포에 굴하지 않고
　용맹하게 싸운 사람들 모두에게
　아낌없는 찬사를 내려주소서…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15526.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>最后请您为两位勇士的
视死如归和勇猛果敢不吝赞词……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15526.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>最後請為兩位勇士
不畏死亡，一路勇猛戰勝至此的表現
不吝贊詞……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15527.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>With that, the purification ritual is over.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15527.ja: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「これで　清めの儀式は終わりだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15527.ko: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 재계 의식은 이걸로 끝이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15527.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>好了，净化仪式结束了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15527.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>這樣淨化儀式就結束了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15528.en:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Amazing! It's always just been a short prayer; this is the
first time I've seen such a full-fledged prayer!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15528.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「すっげー！
　いつもは　お祈りだけの　短いやつだから
　こんな本格的なの　はじめて見たー！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15528.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>: 우와!
　평소에는 기도만 잠깐 하고 끝나던데
　이렇게 제대로 하는 건 처음 봤어요!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15528.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>真厉害！平时都是只是祈祷，时间很短。
头一次见识到这么正式的仪式！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15528.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>真厲害！平時都是只是祈禱，時間很短。
頭一次見識到這麼正式的儀式！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15529.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Before every battle, we used to do this, to be honest.
These days, though, it's became a lot more informal.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15529.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「戦いの前に　毎回　これをやるのが本当なのだ。
　最近は　すっかり略式ばかりになっているがな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15529.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 원래는 싸우기 전에 매번 이렇게 해야 한단다.
　최근에는 약식으로 간단하게 끝냈지만.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15529.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>过去每次战斗前都会举行这个仪式。
但最近仪式渐渐被简化了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15529.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>過去每次戰鬥前都會舉行這個儀式。
但最近儀式都已經簡化了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15530.en: <start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, Village King! What's with the salt and stuff?<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15530.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>「ねえねえ　そんおー！
　お塩を　ブワワワアってするのは　どうして？<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15530.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>: 있잖아요, 촌왕님!
　소금은 왜 뿌리는 거예요?<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15530.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>喂喂，村王！
为什么您要哗啦哗啦地撒盐呢？<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15530.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>喂喂，村王！
為什麼您要嘩啦嘩啦地撒鹽呢？<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15531.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>We do that to soothe the souls of those who died in
battle here. ...And we offer up a prayer so they will
watch over us.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15531.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「この場所で　戦いの果てに死んでいった者たちの
　魂を鎮めるためだ。……そして　我らを
　見守ってくれるよう　祈りを込めているのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15531.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이곳에서 싸우다 죽은 이들의
　영혼을 달래기 위해서지. ……그리고 우리를
　지켜봐 주십사 기도하는 거란다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15531.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>为了安抚在这里战死的人们的灵魂。
同时祈祷我们能得到庇佑。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15531.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>為了安撫
在這裡戰死人們的靈魂……
同時祈禱我們能得到庇佑。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15532.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...In the past, for the god who watches over this arena,
unimaginably gruesome battles to the death were fought
here almost every day.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15532.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「……かつて　神が見守る　この武闘場では
　毎日のように　想像を絶する
　激しい死闘が　繰り広げられていた。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15532.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: ……신께서 지켜보시는 이 무투장에서
　한때는 매일같이 상상을 초월하는
　처절한 사투가 벌어졌다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15532.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>曾经，这个被神明庇佑的比武场
每天都有想象不到的激烈死战。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15532.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>……過去在這個
受到神明守護的武鬥場上，
幾乎每天都有超乎想像的激烈死戰。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15533.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>To create stronger people and to aim even higher.
Because it was the teachings of Rangao Village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15533.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「より強い者を生みだし　さらなる高みを目指す。
　それが　このランガーオ村の教えだったためだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15533.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 더 강한 자를 배출해 더 강한 힘을 바라는 것.
　그것이 랑가오 마을의 가르침이었기 때문이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15533.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>造就更强的勇士，为达成更高的目标而努力。
这曾是我们兰加奥村的村规。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15533.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>造就更強的勇士，為達成更高的目標而努力。
這曾是我們蘭加奧村的村規。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15534.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>For that reason... Everything was given to the victor,
and the loser was cruelly deprived of everything.
Everyone believed it was for the good of the village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15534.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そのために……　勝者には　すべてが与えられ
　敗者は　残酷なまでに　すべてを　うばわれた。
　それが村のためであると　誰もが信じていた。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15534.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 그 때문에…… 승자에게는 모든 것이 주어졌고
　패자는 가혹하리만치 모든 것을 빼앗겼다.
　그것이 마을을 위하는 길이라고 모두가 믿었다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15534.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>因此……胜者会得到一切，
而败者则会被残酷地剥夺一切。
当时每个人都坚信，这样做全是为了村子。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15534.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>因此……勝者會得到一切，
而敗者則會被殘酷地剝奪一切。
當時每個人都堅信，這樣做全是為了村子。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15535.ja: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「だが　今は…………<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15535.ko: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 하지만 지금은…………<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15535.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>但是，现在……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15535.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>但是現在…………<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15536.en: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Yes, yes, yes!! I know!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15536.ja: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「ハイハイハイ！！　オイラ知ってる！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15536.ko: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>: 저요, 저요!! 저 알아요!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15536.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>让咱说让咱说！！咱知道！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15536.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>讓我說讓我說！！我知道！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15537.en:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Now it's not just the victor, but we pay the loser
respects as well, right!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15537.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「今は　勝ったほうだけじゃなくて
　負けたほうにも　ケイイを払うんだよねっ！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15537.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>: 지금은 이긴 사람 말고도
　진 사람에게도 경의를 표해야 해요!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15537.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>现在不只是对胜者，
对败者也要致以敬意吧！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15537.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>現在不只是對勝者，
對敗者也要致以敬意吧！<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15538.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>...That's the way.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15538.ja: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「……その通りだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15538.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>你说得对……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15539.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>For overcoming the fear of death and fighting with
courage, we honor them both equally. That is now
the current teachings of the village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15539.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「死への恐怖に打ち勝ち　勇気を持って
　戦った両者を　等しく敬え。
　それが　今の　この村の教えだ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15539.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 죽음의 공포를 이겨내고 용기 내어
　싸움에 임한 모두를 평등하게 존중하는 것.
　그것이 지금 우리 마을의 가르침이다.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15539.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>向战胜对死亡的恐惧，勇敢对决的
两个人致以同等的敬意。这是现在的村规。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15539.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>向戰勝死亡恐懼，勇敢對決的兩人
致以同等的敬意。
這是現在的村規。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15540.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Children of Rangao Village! Alongside the ritual you
just watched, never ever forget this lesson and you'll
be strong when you grow up!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15540.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ランガーオ村の　子供たちよ！
　さっき見た儀式とともに　その教えを
　決して忘れずに　強く　大きくなるのだ！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15540.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 랑가오 마을의 새싹들이여!
　조금 전에 본 의식과 더불어
　그 가르침을 가슴에 새기고 강하게 자라거라!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15540.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>兰加奥村的孩子们啊！
这条村规要和刚才看到的仪式一起永生不忘，
将来你们也要变强大哦！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15540.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>蘭加奧村的孩子們啊！
這條村規要和剛才看到的儀式一起永生不忘，
將來你們也要變強大喔！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15541.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>, did you see that. The children of this
village are quite bold, it seems.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15541.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「<pc>　見ていたか。
　この村の子供たちは
　なかなか　たくましいだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15541.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 보고 있었나.
　이 마을 아이들은 정말 씩씩하지?<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15541.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>，看到了吗？
村里的孩子们挺健壮的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15541.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc>，看到了嗎？
村裡的孩子們
挺健壯的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15542.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>We pay the same respects to the defeated as to victors...
So long as the children understand that, they will be
fine.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15542.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「敗者にも　勝者と同じように敬意を払う……。
　子供たちが　そのことを
　わかってくれていれば　大丈夫だ。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15542.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 패자에게도 승자와 똑같이 경의를 표한다…….
　아이들이 그 가르침을
　잊지 않는다면 걱정할 일은 없어.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15542.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>对待败者要像对待胜者一样致以敬意……
孩子们只要明白这个就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15542.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>對待敗者
要像對待勝者一樣致以敬意……
孩子們只要明白這個就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15543.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I'm sure they'll lead this village to a righteous future...<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15543.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「きっと　この村を　正しい未来へと
　導いてくれるだろう……。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15543.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 틀림없이 우리 마을을
　올바른 미래로 이끌어 줄 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15543.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>这样的话，
这个村子的未来一定不会偏离正轨的……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15543.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>這樣的話，
這個村子的未來一定不會偏離正軌……<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15544.en:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Oops, that's no good. I haven't even thanked you for
bringing the salt yet.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15544.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「おっと　いかん。
　<pc>に　塩を採ってきてもらった
　礼を　まだ　していなかったな。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15544.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 이런, 내 정신 좀 보게.
　<pc>에게 소금을 부탁한 데 대한
　사례를 아직 안 했군.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15544.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>哦，差点忘了。
委托<pc>你
给我采盐的谢礼还没给你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15544.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>啊，差點忘了。
委託<pc>幫我採鹽的謝禮
還沒給你呢。<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15545.en: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Sorry I'm late! Now, please, take this!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15545.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「遅くなって　すまなかったな！
　さあ　受け取ってくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15545.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>: 늦어서 미안하다!
　자, 받아다오!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15545.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>不好意思，现在才给你！
来，收下吧！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15545.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>不好意思，現在才給你！
來，收下吧！<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

15546.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. If you can, you should see the
Village King performing the purification ritual in
the Village Arena.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15546.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おお　<pc>。
　村王ならば　村の武闘場で
　清めの儀式を　おこなっているぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15546.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>.
　촌왕님은 마을 무투장에서
　재계 의식을 치르고 계신다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15546.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>哦，是你啊<pc>。
村王正在村子里的比武场举行净化仪式呢。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15546.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>。
村王正在村子裡的武鬥場
舉行淨化儀式呢。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15547.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>It seems that the Village King wants to show it to you
for having brought the Eze Salt, so you should
absolutely go there.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15547.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「村王は　エゼソルトを　採ってきてくれた
　<pc>にも　見せたいらしいので
　ぜひ　行ってみるといい。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15547.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 촌왕님은 에제솔트를 구해와 준
　<pc>에게도 보여주고 싶으신 모양이니
　가서 꼭 보도록 해.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15547.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>好像村王也希望帮忙采艾泽盐的
<pc>去看看。
一定要去哦。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15547.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村王似乎也想
讓幫忙採集艾澤鹽的<pc>看看。
還請務必過去一趟。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
